title: Mussafir
textPreview: Current Mhayid of Arshalan. A moderate and competent ruler who stabilized the empire after Chandrial's disastrous war. Father of Leysson, Cemel and Mehrivan. Is very old and increasingly demented.

content.text: Current Mhayid of Arshalan. A moderate and competent ruler who stabilized the empire after Chandrial's disastrous war. Father of Leysson, Cemel and Mehrivan. Is very old and increasingly demented.
